Text: Contribution limits usually rise each year to adjust for inflation. This year, maximum investments are $3,500 for singles and $7,000 for couples.
Cause: Contribution limits usually rise each year to adjust for inflation.
Effect: This year, maximum investments are $3,500 for singles and $7,000 for couples.
Sentence: <e1>Contribution limits usually rise each year to adjust for inflation.</e1> <e2>This year, maximum investments are $3,500 for singles and $7,000 for couples.</e2>
